360 BOOK SERIES

Our Day to Remember

  • Personal

  • 2015

Papercrafting project inspired by Yusuke Oono's 360 books using similar techniques before mass production.

Our Day to Remember was a 40 page wedding montage 360 book, constructed with heavy premium grade white cardstock in Japanese style binding and rotates 360 degrees to form a panoramic 3D paper sculpture.
